answer:
Rabies is a very serious and almost always fatal disease caused by a rabies virus. If you are concerned that you have been exposed to rabies, seek medical care from your health care provider or local health unit right away.
If you are travelling and want to be immunized for rabies, in BC you can receive this vaccine from travel health clinics and may be available through some pharmacies/doctors' offices. There is a charge for most travel vaccines. 
Immunization Nurse
question: i want to get rabies vaccine. how would i proceed
